name: Shady guy
message: Hey, do you want some red dust?

name: Shady guy
message: It can make you forget about the troubles of the city

name: Shady guy
message: Come on, it's cheap, and it makes people happier

name: Option
message: Should I buy this red dust?

name: Shady guy
message: Perfect! It will put your senses to sleep...

name: Option
message: I feel strange I think I should go now

name: Shady guy
message: Come back later if you want some, I'm sure you will
